com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.data
Class JsonReader<C>

java.lang.Object
  com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.data.JsonReader<C>
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataReader<C,ListLoadResult<ModelData>>
public class JsonReader<C>
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataReader<C,ListLoadResult<ModelData>>

A DataReader implementation that reads JSON data using a ModelType definition and produces a set of ModelData instances. Subclass may override newModelInstance() to return any model data subclass.

Constructor Summary

          Creates a new JSON reader.

          Reads the raw data and returns the typed data.
